newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar closes firm at 472.75/474/dlr.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar closes firm at 472.75/474/dlr.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed firmer against the dollar at 472.75/474.00 as businesses bought bolivars to fund local operations, traders said.
The unit closed Friday at 474.00/475.00 per dollar.
"Clients were buying bolivars because they needed them, not to speculate," said one broker.
"It was that, rather than any Central Bank dollar sales, that brought the dollar down today," he said, adding however that he saw 474/475 "as a more realistic rate".
The market was closed earlier this week for Carnival celebrations.
